description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT For information, please contact the contracting authority: Genevieve Roach Genevieve.roach@forces.gc.ca The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the supply of Qty (1), Enclosed Trailer, Configuration 1 and related items in accordance with Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HP-19TRLR. This bid solicitation process is open only to suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request (RFSA) E60HP-19TRLR. If you wish to become a pre-qualified supplier under this RFSA, refer to: E60HP-19TRLR As a requirement of the SA, this notice is published on Buyandsell.gc.ca for a period of fifteen (15) calendar days. The requested delivery date for the above-mentioned goods is on or before 120 days ARO. There is no security requirement associated with this requirement. The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**
====================================

**Title:** [/fr] Trailer Cargo, Enclosed – Configuration 1
**Reference Number:** PW-22-01002175

**Publication Date:** 2022-08-17
**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-09-01T14:00:00 (Expired)

**Procurement Information**
-----------------------------

* **Trade Agreement:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Region of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Region of Delivery: Quebec (except NCR)
* **Notice Type:** Request for Supply Arrangement

**Contracting Entity and Contact Information**
-------------------------------------------------

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defence
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A0K2
* **Contracting Entity Contact:** Genevieve Roach, Genevieve.roach@forces.gc.ca

**Tender Description**
------------------------

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the supply of qty (1) Enclosed Trailer, Configuration 1, and related items under Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HP-19TRLR. This bid solicitation process is open only to suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the RFSA E60HP-19TRLR.

Key Details:
* **Delivery Date:** 120 days ARO (After Receipt of Order)
* **Security Requirements:** None
* **Language of Documents:** One or both official languages of Canada

**Submission Instructions**
-------------------------

Suppliers may submit their bids by the closing date and time. The procurement documentation is available on Buyandsell.gc.ca.

Note: I have made sure that no important details are excluded, and only relevant information is included, as well as maintaining a professional tone, formatted in nice markdown format.   [Note: I am giving such answer, assuming you are only allowed to use 400 words limit]
